Benchmarks¶

Below are few benchmarks of the code.

Time Taken vs Tolerance¶

These benchmarks were performed for size of the matrix \(N = 1000000\), with the size of the leaf node set to \(M = 100\).

Tolerance Assembly(s) MatVec(s)
\(10^{-2}\) 19.8358 9.65095
\(10^{-4}\) 49.7557 8.55117
\(10^{-6}\) 70.4369 8.57725
\(10^{-8}\) 126.125 12.9264
\(10^{-10}\) 214.757 52.5742
\(10^{-12}\) 419.34 47.0097
\(10^{-14}\) 749.672 79.0786

Time Taken vs Size of Matrix¶

For these benchmarks, the leaf size was fixed at \(M = 100\), with tolerance set to \(10^{-12}\)

\(N\) Assembly(s) MatVec(s)
\(5 \times 10^{3}\) 0.309096 0.040681
\(10^{4}\) 1.88374 0.062273
\(5 \times 10^{4}\) 14.2385 0.47138
\(10^{5}\) 29.3395 1.20935
\(5 \times 10^{5}\) 244.375 42.0531
\(10^{6}\) 419.34 47.0097

AFMM2D
